amendment.description: Amendment provides a 5 year sunset for the provisions contained in section 305 which allow a bank to sell insurance in a State that it is not currently selling in.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 12 in part 2 of Hosue Report 105-531, to permit national banks and their subsidiaries to sell title insurance as agents. The amendment does not affect the prohibition on national banks' underwriting of title insurance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran (VA) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
